Detailed Description

template<typename Var>
struct WatchNotInSetConstraint< Var >

constraints;w-notinset Description The constraint w-notinset(x, [a1,...,an]) ensures that x does not belong to the set {a1,..,an}. constraints;w-notinset References See also

help constraints w-inset

template<typename Var>
virtual bool WatchNotInSetConstraint< Var >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.
